title: Echo: Desert Run
description: This Eisner Award nominated series by Terry Moore is hot Julie Martin wakes up in a desert motel covered in a radioactive atomic alloy capable of fantastic destruction. Pursued by a maniacal killer and a sexy government mercenary, Julie discovers the spirit of another woman is living inside her...and the two of them must stop the alloy from destroying the world Collects issues 11-15.
author: Terry Moore
